posts._title: Stanley Kubrick – Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1964)
posts.title: Dr Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
posts.excerpt: Quote: In 1964, with the Cuban Missile Crisis fresh in viewers’ minds, the Cold War at its frostiest, and the hydrogen bomb relatively new and frightening, Stanley Kubrick dared to make a film about what could happen if the wrong person pushed the wrong button — and played the situation for laughs. Dr. Strangelove’s jet-black …

posts._title: Jules Dassin – Du rififi chez les hommes AKA Rififi (1955)
posts.title: Du rififi chez les hommes
posts.excerpt: Quote: The modern heist movie was invented in Paris in 1954 by Jules Dassin, with “Rififi,” and Jean-Pierre Melville, with “Bob le Flambeur.” Dassin built his film around a 28-minute safe-cracking sequence that is the father of all later movies in which thieves carry out complicated robberies. Working across Paris at the same time, Melville’s …

posts._title: Arnaud Desplechin – Trois souvenirs de ma jeunesse AKA My Golden Days (2015)
posts.title: Trois souvenirs de ma jeunesse
posts.excerpt: Paul is preparing to leave Tajikistan, while thinking back on his adolescent years. His childhood, his mother’s madness, the parties, the trip to the USSR where he lost his virginity, the friend who betrayed him and the love of his life.

posts._title: Costas Zapas – The Last Porn Movie (2006)
posts.title: The Last Porn Movie
posts.excerpt: Description: The story of a beautiful teenager girl whose life is turned around when her ex-porn star dad is made (by his producers) to cast her as the lead in his latest x-rated film. posts.title: Easy Rider
posts.excerpt: Quote: Nobody went to see Easy Rider (1969) only once. It became one of the rallying-points of the late ’60s, a road picture and a buddy picture, celebrating sex, drugs, rock ‘n’ roll, and the freedom of the open road. posts.title: Medium
posts.excerpt: Suspenseful for most of its length, though a letdown at the end, this psychic thriller is about four very different people who are drawn to one particular place in the town of Sopot, a resort on the Baltic Sea.
